Name: Highland Drum
Ingredients: 60 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The classic blend of Scotch and Drambuie with fresh orange and vermouth complexity.
History: Created by Salvatore Calabrese at Salvatore at Fifty, London, England.
